direction.raw_text: We skim above a dark, wild ocean. The camera turns toward a lone island, Berk. It is a gigantic shard of rock jutting straight out of the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) This, is Berk. It's twelve days North of hopeless, and a few degrees South of freezing to death. It's located solidly on the meridian of misery. The camera drifts over rolling hills to reveal a small village nestled on an outcropping of sea mounts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) My village. In a word, sturdy. And it's been here for seven generations, but every single building is new. The camera drifts closer, circling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) We have fishing, hunting, and a charming view of the sunsets. The only problems are the pests. You see, most places have mice or mosquitos. We have... Sheep graze peacefully on a hillside. Suddenly one is snatched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A door is pulled open... as a DRAGON swoops directly toward it, BLASTING FIRE. The door is SLAMMED. The fire shoots through the slats of wood, illuminating HICCUP, a gangly teenage Viking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He reopens the sizzling door, as leaps off of the front porch. He weaves through the erupting mayhem as Vikings pour out of the buildings, ready for a fight. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 2. More dragons swarm in, setting rooftops alight and hauling off sheep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Most people would leave. Not us. We're Vikings. We have stubbornness issues. Vikings sound the alarm. Viking men and women pour out into the streets, axes in hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: darting through alleys, staying under eaves, making his way through the battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) My name's Hiccup. Great name, I know. But it's not the worst. Parents believe a hideous name will frighten off gnomes and trolls. Like our charming Viking demeanor wouldn't do that. Dragons sweep back and forth, dodging axes and blasting the Vikings who throw them. A burly warrior gets tossed in an explosion, knocking Hiccup to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arggghhhhh! (cheery, insane) Mornin'! Hiccup gets to his feet and continues to rush past gigantic men and women.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Meet the neighbors. Hoark the Haggard...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing out!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Burnthair the Broad...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get inside!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Phlegma the Fierce...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get back inside! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 3.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Ack. He passes a silent ox of a viking, picking his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep, just Ack. Enter STOICK, the biggest Viking of all. He yanks Hiccup from the path of a strafing dragon and holds aloft to the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup!? (accusingly; to the crowd) What is he doing out again?! (TO HICCUP) What are you doing out?! Get inside! The flames light up his scowling face and matted red beard. He sets Hiccup down and turns to the sky, searching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (IN AWE) That's Stoick the Vast. Chief of the tribe. They say that when he was a baby he popped a dragon's head clean off of its shoulders. Do I believe it? Stoick grabs a wooden cart and hurls it, knocking the strafing dragon out of the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) Yes I do. An EXPLOSION forces Vikings to DUCK. Stoick stands firm, brushing flaming debris off of his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (barking; to his men) What have we got?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gronkles. Nadders. Zipplebacks. Oh, and Hoark saw a Monstrous Nightmare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any Night Furies?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None so far. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 4.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hoist the torches! Massive flaming braziers are raised on poles, lighting up the night sky... and revealing swirling dragons of all types. Below, Hiccup crosses an open plaza and ducks into an open building with a tall chimney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He crosses behind a counter, where a peg-legged, one-armed hulk of a Blacksmith reshapes blades with a hammer and tongs appendage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! Nice of you to join the party. I thought you'd been carried off. Hiccup dons a leather apron and starts to put away Gobber's scattered appendages.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who me? Nah, come on! I'm way too muscular for their taste. They wouldn't know what to do with all this. Hiccup strikes a bodybuilder pose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They need toothpicks, don't they? Hiccup gets to work, transferring bent and chipped weapons to the forge as Vikings crowd the counter for replacements.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) The meathead with attitude and interchangeable hands is Gobber. I've been his apprentice ever since I was little. Well...littler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We move to the lower defenses. We'll counter-attack with the catapults. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 5. Armed men rush past, flanking others who carry sheep to safety. Stoick follows up the rear as, overhead, a dragon strafes the rooftops with Napalm-like fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) See? Old village. Lots and lots of new houses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! In response, the fire brigade charges through the plaza -- four TEENS, tugging a large wooden cask on wheels. From it, they fill buckets of water to douse the flames. One among them is a cute, energetic Viking girl. Hiccup leans out of the stall to watch her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Oh and that's Fishlegs, Snotlout. The twins Ruffnut and Tuffnut. And... (DREAMY) Astrid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: explosion erupts behind her, framing her in a sexy ball of fire. The others join her, looking awesome and heroic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) Their job is so much cooler. Hiccup tries to join them as they pass, but he's hooked by Gobber and hoisted back inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (PLEADING) Ah, come on. Let me out, please. I need to make my mark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you've made plenty of marks. All in the wrong places.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, two minutes. I'll kill a dragon. My life will get infinitely better. I might even get a date.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't lift a hammer. You can't swing an axe... Gobber grabs a bola (iron balls connected by rope). "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 6.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... you can't even throw one of these. A Viking runs by and nabs it out of Gobber's hand, hurling it at a dive-bombing Gronkle. The bola binds its legs, sending it into a heavy crash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (ready with the answer) Okay fine, but... He rushes to the back corner of the stall and presents a bizarre, wheel barrow-like contraption.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... this will throw it for me. Hiccup OPENS the hinged lid of the device. An arm springs up, equipped with twin bows. They prematurely launch a bola, narrowly missing Gobber... and taking out a Viking at the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arggh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See, now this right here is what I'm talking about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mild calibration issue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup. If you ever want to get out there to fight dragons, you need to stop all... Gobber gestures in Hiccup's general direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... you just pointed to all of me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! That's it! Stop being all of you. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 7.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhhh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhhhh, yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You, sir, are playing a dangerous game. Keeping this much, raw...Vikingness contained. (BEAT) There will be consequences! Gobber tosses him a sword.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take my chances. Sword. Sharpen. Now. Hiccup takes it begrudgingly and lobs it onto the grinding wheel. He stews... fantasizing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) One day I'll get out there. Because killing a dragon is everything around here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nadders land, gathering like seagulls around a seemingly vacant house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) A Nadder head is sure to get me at least noticed. The Nadders clamber onto the building, tearing the roof and walls apart. Sheep pour out and SCATTER. Elsewhere, hippo-like Gronckles pick drying racks clean of fish and fly off like loaded pelicans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) Gronckles are tough. Taking down one of those would definitely get me a girlfriend. A stealthy, snake-like dragon head peeks over a rooftop, breathing gas into a chimney. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 8.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) A Zippelback? Exotic, exciting. Two heads, twice the status. A second head pokes through the door and lights it. KABLAM! The two heads fly through the explosion, their necks zipping together to reveal a single body. It flies past Stoick as he climbs to the top of a CATAPULT TOWER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They found the sheep!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Concentrate fire over the lower bank!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire! Boulders are catapulted at the corralling Nadders... Just as a huge red dragon whips past, spraying the base of the catapult with sticky fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) And then there's the Monstrous Nightmare. Only the best Vikings go after those. They have this nasty habit of setting themselves on fire. It emerges from the flames, climbing the catapult with a leering, toothy grin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Reload! I'll take care of this. Stoick takes on the Nightmare, face to hammer. Suddenly, a LOUD BALLISTIC MOANING streaks overhead. The catapult crew ducks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looking up from his work, reacting to the same sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) But the ultimate prize is the dragon no one has ever seen. We call it the-- "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 9.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Night Fury! Get down! Vikings everywhere take shelter. The moaning sound BUILDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Monstrous Nightmare suddenly stops fighting and takes flight. Stoick looks skyward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Catapult EXPLODES as though hit by an artillery shell... sending Stoick and the crew leaping for their lives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) This thing never steals food, never shows itself, and... The sound recedes, leaving the crippled catapult in flames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) ...never misses. (BEAT) No one has ever killed a Night Fury. That's why I'm going to be the first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gobber trades his hammer for an axe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man the fort, Hiccup, they need me out there! Gobber pauses. Turns with a threatening glare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay. Put. There. You know what I mean. Gobber charges into the fray, HOLLERING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a smirk crosses his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Hiccup pushes his wheeled contraption through a wall of clustered Vikings. He weaves through the ongoing mayhem, as fast as his legs can carry him. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 10.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #6 (O.S.) Hiccup, where are you going!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come back here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. Be right back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Nadders have cornered the house-full of sheep. They close in, ready to spring upon them. Stoick suddenly appears, HURLING FISHING NETS over them. The surprised Nadders are caught. Stoick and his men rush in. A Nadder blasts a hole through its net. Stoick leaps onto it, clamping his thick arms around its head, forcing its jaws shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mind yourselves! The devils still have some juice in them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup reaches a cliff overlooking the smoking CATAPULT and drops the handles to the ground. He cranks several levers, unfolding and then cocking the bowed arms of his contraption. He drops a bola onto a chamber and then pivots the weapon on a gimbal head toward the dark sky. He listens, with his eye pressed to the scope, hand poised on the trigger. He hears the NIGHT FURY approaching... and turns his aim to the defense tower. It closes in for the final strike, completely camouflaged in the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Give me something to shoot at, give me something to shoot at.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The tower topples. The blast of fire illuminates the dragon for a split second. Hiccup pulls the trigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The flexed arms SNAP forward, springing the weapon off the ground. The bola disappears into the sky, followed by a WHACK and a SCREECH. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 11.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (surprised, then elated) Oh I hit it! Yes, I hit it! Did anybody see that? Hiccup's victory is short-lived. A Monstrous Nightmare appears, slithering up over the lip of the cliff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Except for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: holding down the netted Nadders. He hears a familiar HOLLER and looks up to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: running through the PLAZA, SCREAMING, with the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fast on his heels. Alarmed, Stoick abandons the Nadders and runs off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to his men, re: the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: let them escape!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vikings scatter as Hiccup dodges a near fatal blast. The Nightmare's sticky, Napalm-like fire splashes up onto buildings, setting them alight. Hiccup ducks behind the last standing brazier -- the only shelter available. The Nightmare blasts it, spraying fire all around him. Hiccup peers around the smoldering post. No sign of the Nightmare. He turns back to find it leering at him, blocking his escape. It takes a deep breath. Hiccup is finished. Suddenly, Stoick LEAPS between them, tackling the Nightmare to the ground. They tumble and wrestle, resuming their earlier fight. The Nightmare tries to toast him, but only coughs up smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're all out. He smashes the Nightmare repeatedly in the face, driving it away. It takes to the air and disappears. Winded, Stoick turns to Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Oh, and there's one more thing you need to know... "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 12. The burnt brazier pole collapses, sending the massive iron basket crashing. It bounces down the hill, destroying as it goes and scattering the Vikings who were holding down the netted Nadders. The freed dragons escape... with several sheep in tow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, dad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The escaped Nadders fly past with sheep in their clutches. The raid is over. The dragons have clearly won. The murmuring crowd eyes Stoick, awaiting his response.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, but I hit a Night Fury. Stoick grabs Hiccup by the back scruff of his collar and hauls him away, fuming with embarrassment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not like the last few times, Dad. I mean I really actually hit it. You guys were busy and I had a very clear shot. It went down, just off Raven Point. Let's get a search party out there, before it--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Just....stop. He releases Hiccup. Everyone goes silent, staring expectantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every time you step outside, disaster follows. Can you not see that I have bigger problems? Winter's almost here and I have an entire village to feed! Hiccup looks around. All eyes are upon him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Between you and me, the village could do with a little less feeding, don't ya think? A few rotund Vikings stir self-consciously. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 13.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't a joke, Hiccup! (EXASPERATED) Why can't you follow the simplest orders?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't stop myself. I see a dragon and I have to just... kill it, you know? It's who I am, Dad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are many things, Hiccup. But a dragon killer is not one of them. Sting. Hiccup looks around to see many nods of agreement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get back to the house. (TO GOBBER) Make sure he gets there. I have his mess to clean up. Stoick lumbers off in the opposite direction. Gobber leads Hiccup through the walk of shame. They pass the teen fire brigade as they snicker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quite the performance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never seen anyone mess up that badly. That helped!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, thank you. I was trying, so... Hiccup avoids Astrid's glare and heads up toward a large house, standing prominently on the hill above the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really did hit one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He never listens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it runs in the family. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 14.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And when he does, it's always with this... disappointed scowl. Like someone skimped on the meat in his sandwich. (MIMICKING STOICK) Excuse me, barmaid. I'm afraid you brought me the wrong offspring. I ordered an extra large boy with beefy arms. Extra guts and glory on the side. This here. This is a talking fish bone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're thinking about this all wrong. It's not so much what you look like. It's what's inside that he can't stand. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, for summing that up. They reach the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, the point is, stop trying so hard to be something you're not. Hiccup SIGHS heavily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just want to be one of you guys. Gobber eyes him sympathetically. Hiccup turns and goes through the front door. And straight out the back door. He hurries off into the woods, determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A noisy din of PROTESTING VOICES leads to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: glowering in the firelight. Surrounded by his men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Either we finish them or they'll finish us! It's the only way we'll be rid of them! If we find the nest and destroy it, the dragons will leave. They'll find another home. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 15. He sinks his blade into a...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: spread out on the table... the blade pierces the middle of an uncharted corner, swirling with painted sea monsters and dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (DECIDEDLY) One more search. Before the ice sets in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those ships never come back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're Vikings. It's an occupational hazard. Now who's with me? Stoick throws up his fist. No one follows. The crowds shifts in restless silence. Head scratches. Eyes averted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Today's not good for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (EQUALLY FEEBLE) I've gotta do my axe returns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright. Those who stay will look after Hiccup. Hands jut into the air, volunteers galore. Enthusiastic murmurs of prep and packing fill the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the ships!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm with you Stoick!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's more like it. The Vikings rush for the door, leaving Gobber and Stoick alone. Gobber gulps back the contents of his tankard attachment and scrapes back the bench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll pack my undies. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 16.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I need you to stay and train some new recruits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, perfect. And while I'm busy, Hiccup can cover the stall. Molten steel, razor sharp blades, lots of time to himself...what could possibly go wrong? Stoick sinks onto the bench beside Gobber, his brow burdened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I going to do with him Gobber?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put him in training with the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm serious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So am I. Stoick turns to him, glaring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'd be killed before you let the first dragon out of its cage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you don't know that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do know that, actually.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, actually I do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No you don't!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen! You know what he's like. From the time he could crawl he's been...different. He doesn't listen. (MORE) "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 17.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has the attention span of a sparrow. I take him fishing and he goes hunting for... for trolls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trolls exist! They steal your socks. (DARKLY) But only the left ones. What's with that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I was a boy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh here we go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father told me to bang my head against a rock and I did it. I thought it was crazy, but I didn't question him. And you know what happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got a headache.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That rock split in two. It taught me what a Viking could do, Gobber. He could crush mountains, level forests, tame seas! Even as a boy, I knew what I was, what I had to become. (BEAT) Hiccup is not that boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't stop him, Stoick. You can only prepare him. (BEAT) Look, I know it seems hopeless. But the truth is you won't always be around to protect him. He's going to get out there again. He's probably out there now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Gobber's words hit their mark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 18. A drawn map of the island, covered in X's. Hiccup looks up from it and peeks over a gorge, expectantly. Sees nothing. He adds another 'X' to the page, then scratches his pencil over the whole map in frustration. He snaps the book closed and pockets it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uggh, the gods hate me. Some people lose their knife or their mug. No, not me. I manage to lose an entire dragon. Hiccup WHACKS a low-hanging branch. It SNAPS back at him, hitting him in the face. He looks up to see a snapped tree trunk. His eyes follow it to a long trench of up-turned earth. He follows it to a downed, black dragon, its body and tail tangled in a bola. It appears dead. Hiccup approaches, beaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (IN SHOCK) Oh wow. I did it. I did it. This fixes everything. (ELATED) Yes! He strikes a victory pose, planting his foot on the fallen Night Fury.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have brought down this mighty beast! It suddenly shifts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Hiccup springs back, terrified. He turns his blade on it. Rattled, Hiccup creeps along the length of the weak, wounded dragon, dagger poised to strike. As he reaches the head, Hiccup finds the Night Fury staring coldly at him. Hiccup tries to look away, but he's drawn back to its unnerving, unflinching stare. With the dragon safety tangled in the ropes, Hiccup jabs with his dagger, puffing himself up with false bravado. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 19.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to kill you, Dragon. I'm gonna cut out your heart and take it to my father. I'm a Viking. (BEAT) I am a VIKING! Hiccup raises the dagger, determined to prove his Viking- ness. The dragon's labored breathing breaks Hiccup's clenched concentration. He opens an eye, uncertainty leaking through. The dragon holds the stare. Something profound is exchanged. Finally, the Night Fury closes its eye and lowers its head, resigned to its fate. Hiccup tries to go through with it, holding the dagger aloft... fighting himself... until finally lowering it with a frustrated sigh. He looks over the dragon's chaffed rope wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (muttered, ashamed) I did this. He turns to leave. Pauses. And glances back at the dragon, chest heaving. Hiccup GRUMBLES. He checks over his shoulder to ensure that no one is watching... then hurries back to cut the ropes. The Night Fury's eye shoots open. With the dragon watching his every move, Hiccup hurriedly saws through the bola ropes. As the last rope falls free, the Night Fury suddenly POUNCES! In a blur, the dragon is upon him, pinning Hiccup down, grazing his neck. Looking like it's about to kill him. Hiccup is paralyzed. The dragon's breath ruffles his hair. Hiccup opens his eyes to find the Night Fury's wolf-like stare boring into him. The exchange is intense, profound. The dragon draws a deep breath, as though it's about to torch him, then lets out an ear-piercing scream instead. It turns and takes flight, flapping violently through the canopy of trees. It bashes against a nearby mountain side, recovers, and drops out of view some distance away. Winded, Hiccup struggles to his feet, staggers a few steps, collapses to his knees, and faints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup enters to see... "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 20.

direction.raw_text: It's MAGIC HOUR. Toothless wakes, hanging upside down from a tree. He spots Hiccup sitting on the other side of the cove. Sketching in the sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON a sketch of Toothless. Hiccup draws with a stick, minding his own business. Toothless appears behind him, watching carefully. Aware of his presence, Hiccup continues, trying not to scare him off. Toothless walks off. A moment later, he reappears with an entire sapling, drawing lines in the sand. He rushes here and there, making haphazard lines in every direction. Finally, Toothless drops the tree and inspects his work. He seems pleased. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 39. Hiccup stands and takes in the sprawling scribble, amazed by it. He accidentally steps onto one of the lines, eliciting an instant growl from Toothless. He steps on it again. Toothless growls again. Realizing how sensitive he is, Hiccup steps carefully between each line, turning round and round until he unwittingly bumps into Toothless. Toothless snorts. Once again, they're face to face. Hiccup slowly extends his hand. Toothless hesitates. Hiccup turns his head away and closes his eyes. To his amazement, Toothless bridges the gap and presses his muzzle against Hiccup's hand. In a flash, the dragon is gone, leaving Hiccup astounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gobber and the recruits are seated at the top of an abandoned catapult tower, toasting campfire food around a roaring bonfire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and with one twist he took my hand and swallowed it whole. And I saw the look on his face. (can't deny it) I was delicious. He must have passed the word, because it wasn't a month before another one of them took my leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't it weird to think that your hand was inside a dragon. Like if your mind was still in control of it you could have killed the dragon from the inside by crushing his heart or something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear I'm so angry right now. I'll avenge your beautiful hand and your beautiful foot. I'll chop off the legs of every dragon I fight, with my face. He postures to Astrid. She rolls her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (with a mouthful) Un-unh. It's the wings and the tails you really want. If it can't fly, it can't get away. A downed dragon is a dead dragon. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 40.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hiding his horrified look form the others. Gobber stands and stretches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright. I'm off to bed. You should be too. Tomorrow we get into the big boys. Slowly but surely making our way up to the Monstrous Nightmare. (playful, taunting) But who'll win the honor of killing it? He hobbles off. The teens reflect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (very matter of fact) It's gonna be me. (BEAT) It's my destiny. See? Tuffnut rolls up his sleeve to reveal a red dragon on his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mom let you get a tattoo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a tattoo. It's a birthmark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I've been stuck with you since birth, and that was never there before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes it was. You've just never seen me from the left side until now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't there yesterday. Is it a birthmark or a today-mark? Hiccup gets up and walks away from the group. Astrid watches him as he leaves the bonfire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 41.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup enters a small room at the back of the stall. It's covered in drawings of weaponry and scale models. He lights a candle and lays his sketchbook out on the desk, opening it to the drawing of Toothless. With a look of determination. Hiccup picks up a charcoal stick and re-draws the missing tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON ... a creaking leather bellows. The stone forge glows with every pump. Tongs pull intricate iron pieces from the coals. They're dropped onto the anvil, twisted, lightly hammered, and dunked in a barrel. The pieces are carried to Hiccup's workbench and laid out in place on a one-to-one schematic. It's a sketch of a mechanical fin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup arrives, winded, straining under the weight of a full basket. He clicks the scale he found (like a jar top). Toothless approaches, sniffing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Toothless. I brought breakfast. I hope you're hungry. Hiccup drops the basket and kicks it over. Fish spill out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, that's disgusting. Toothless approaches, settling in to devour the feast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh..we've got some salmon... Toothless swallows it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... some nice Icelandic cod... Swallows those too. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 42.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... and a whole smoked eel. Toothless nabs it, chews a few times, then spits it out. He shakes his head violently, snorts and scrubs his massive tongue on the sand. Hiccup takes note.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no! It's okay. Yeah, I don't like eel much either. Toothless focuses on the remainder. With the dragon distracted, Hiccup unwraps his prosthetic fin and opens it like a fan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. That's it. That's it, just stick with good stuff. And don't you mind me. I'll just be back...here. Minding my own business. Hiccup cautiously approaches the injured tail, but every time he gets near it, Toothless sweeps it away like a cat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay. Hiccup drops a knee on top of the tail. Toothless' head juts up, slows its chewing to a halt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay...okay.. The dragon tenses, slowly spreading his wings. Hiccup straps the prosthetic fin in place. He cinches the straps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (PLEASED) There. Not too bad. It works. Toothless BOLTS! He snaps his massive wings and takes to the air, carrying Hiccup with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woah! No! No! No! Hiccup struggles to hold on to the tail. As the ground speeds away, Toothless immediately TIPS into a uncontrolled bank and dive. Hiccup sees the folded fin rattling uselessly in opposition to its flared counterpart. Flap as he may, Toothless can't correct his trajectory. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 43. Hiccup swallows his fear and crawls toward the folded prosthetic. He reaches it and YANKS it open. The flared, fan- like appendage catches the air, stabilizing the twisting tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (excited, terrified) It's working! Toothless arcs just short of the water and climbs... high into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Yes, I did it. He glances back at Hiccup, busily holding the tail open while trying to hold on. They're going to crash. Whoomp! Hiccup is suddenly thrown from the tail in the intense force of a turn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AAAAAGGGGHHHHH! He bounces across the water's surface and takes a dive. Without Hiccup to operate the tail, Toothless does the same, plunging in a massive cannonball. Hiccup resurfaces, roughed up, but beaming. Toothless appears seconds later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Today is about teamwork. Work together and you might survive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Gas seeps through the cracks. It BLASTS OPEN. A cloud of smoke engulfs the ring, swirling around the paired-up teens. Astrid with Ruffnut. Snotlout with Tuffnut. Fishlegs with Hiccup. All carry buckets of water, poised to throw them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, a wet dragon head can't light its fire. The Hideous Zippleback is extra tricky. One head breathes gas, the other head lights it. Your job is to know which is which. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 44. The smoke encircles them, cutting them off from each other. The teens LISTEN and WATCH for any sign of the dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (muttering to himself) Razor sharp, serrated teeth that inject venom for pre-digestion. Prefers ambush attack, crushing its victims in its...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you please stop that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moving nervously through the fog, back to back. Snotlout is singing to himself to calm his nerves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If that dragon shows either of his faces, I'm gonna-- (spotting an approaching shape, terrified) --There! Snotlout and Tuffnut HURL their water into the fog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's us, idiots. Astrid and Ruffnut are soaked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your butts are getting bigger. We thought you were a dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not that there's anything wrong with a dragon-esque figure. Astrid ELBOWS Snotlout in the face. Ruffnut DROPS Tuffnut with a PUNCH to the throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. They FREEZE. A tail SWEEPS out of the fog, taking them down. Their buckets spill. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 45.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: coming across them. They see the puddles of spilled water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I'm hurt. I am very much hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chances of survival are dwindling into single digits now...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look out! A Zippleback head emerges out of the smoke. Fishlegs hurls his water at it, completely dousing the head. It leers and opens its mouth, spewing gas into the area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. Wrong head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: around their legs. Fishlegs flees in a panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fishlegs! Beat. A clicking sound comes from behind them. Sparks flash in the smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, Hiccup! The other head sweeps out of the smoke. Hiccup hurls his water with all his might. It arcs and drops short of the dragon's sparking mouth. The dragon grins, savoring the kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Gobber COVERS his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup! Beat. The Zippleback hesitates. SNIFFS. Then retreats. The teens get to their feet, watching transfixed. Gobber peeks through his fingers to see... "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 46. The Zippleback backing away from Hiccup. He stands and holds his hands out, as if controlling it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BACK! BACK! Now don't you make me tell you again! The Zippleback retreats through its door and into its cave, hissing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, that's right. Back into your cage. Hiccup slyly OPENS his vest, revealing the spotted smoked EEL from earlier. He TOSSES it inside the door, then SLAMS it shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now think about what you've done. Hiccup turns to the teens and Gobber. They stare, slack-jawed
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay! So are we done? Because I've got some things I need to... Hiccup jogs out of the ring, past the speechless group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep...see you tomorrow. Astrid SNEERS. Something's going on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: INT. BLACKSMITH STALL - HICCUP'S CLOSET - CONTINUOUS Hiccup cuts and stitches leather, draws and shapes steel. He works by candlelight. An overhead shot reveals what he's building: a harness, complete with handles and foot pedals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup appears before Toothless, holding the new prosthetic. Toothless runs off as Hiccup chases him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 47.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless and Hiccup are zooming over the ocean. The tail breaks free sending Hiccup flying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Whoa!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup adjusts the harness and uses a metal clamp to affix himself to Toothless' saddle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup and Toothless zip through the air -- his rudimentary harness and tail controls are working, barely. They crash- land in an open field. Hiccup recovers to find Toothless still rolling around in the tall grass. Hiccup discovers that it's a patch of a dragon- nip.' Toothless writhes on his back, tongue wagging, in complete bliss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup grabs the head as instructed, then discreetly pulls a fistful of a dragon-nip' and presses it up to the Gronkle's nose. It immediately stops struggling and goes weak in the knees. Hiccup drops the handful of dragon-nip to the ground. The Gronkle goes down with it, whimpering and blissful. From Gobber and the recruits' point of view, Hiccup is controlling the Gronkle with no more than a limp arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The recruits walk home together, surrounding Hiccup and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Hiccup, I've never seen a Gronkle to that before.

direction.raw_text: How'd you do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was really cool. He squirms and invents an excuse. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 48.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I left my axe back in the ring. He turns and hurries back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You guys go on ahead and I'll catch up with you. Astrid watches, suspicious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup rubs Toothless behind the ear, causing him to relax and fall over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An angry Deadly Nadder approaches Hiccup. Just as Astrid moves in to strike, Hiccup performs his special rubbing technique, which sends the Nadder down. Astrid and the other kids look on from the sideline in amazement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup sits down at a table to eat. The other recruits notice him and move over to his table to talk to him -- leaving Astrid alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Hiccup!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was that? Some kind of trick? What did you do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup, you're totally going to come in first, there's no question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup is using a mirror-like object to create a patch of light on the ground. Toothless claws and chases the light patch like a cat chasing a laser pointer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A beam lifts from the door of another dragon pen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meet the Terrible Terror. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 49. A tiny, pint-sized dragon steps out and moves toward the recruits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha. It's like the size of my-- Tuffnut is taken down in a blur.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get it off! Get it off! Oh! I'm hurt, I am very much hurt! Hiccup stops the Terrible Terror with the same light-patch trick he used earlier with Toothless. The tiny dragon retreats back to it's cage. The teens approach him yet again as Astrid looks on with suspicion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO ASTRID) Wow, he's better than you ever were.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Astrid furiously hurls her axe at a nearby tree. She notices Hiccup walking by in the distance, carrying one of his trademark harnesses. She quickly tries to follow, but he loses her in the woods. She HUFFS, frustrated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup straps a newly designed harness onto Toothless. With Toothless tied to a nearby post with a rope. Hiccup rides him in the air -- while stationary. Toothless looks like a giant kite tied to a tree stump. This harness seems to work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rope breaks and the pair CRASH into a tree. Hiccup's face is red.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The streets are empty save for a lone Viking who crosses Hiccup's path. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 50.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup. Hiccup nods, trying to look casual. Once the coast is clear, he covertly steers Toothless into the Blacksmith's stall. Toothless PRESSES himself inside, rooting through stuff and making a racket. Astrid, walking nearby, is alerted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hiccup? Hiccup FREEZES. Then frantically tries to pry the ring off the saddle hook. It won't budge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you in there? Too late - she's right outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: walking along the outside of the Blacksmith's. Hiccup JUMPS OUT the window and CLOSES the shutters behind him. Hiccup's harness line is stretched through the window, still attached to Toothless' saddle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Astrid. Hey! Hi Astrid. Hi Astrid. Hi Astrid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I normally don't care what people do, but you're acting weird. Well, weirder. Toothless spots a nearby sheep and makes a move toward it. As a result, Hiccup is suddenly PULLED TIGHT against the window shutters. He STRIKES A POSE to compensate... then gets PULLED THROUGH the shutters. They snap back in Astrid's face. Astrid reopens them and finds nothing but an empty stall. In the distance, Toothless and Hiccup slip off unseen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lone, battered ship is pulled into a slip, overloaded with equally battered-looking men. They disembark to a crowd of onlookers, looking like a team of hometown heroes who just had their butts kicked. Gobber hobbles through the MUMBLING crowd to find Stoick -- last to disembark and glowering with battered pride. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 51.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are the other ships?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't want to know. Stoick lumbers past Gobber, leaving him staring at the trashed ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I trust you found the nest at least?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not even close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. Excellent. Gobber follows Stoick up the ramp and snags his duffle bag with his hook appendage, sharing the burden.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you had a little more success than me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if by success, you mean that your parenting troubles are over with, then... yes. Stoick stops. What does that mean? A group of merry villagers rush past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations Stoick! Everyone is so relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out with the old and in with the new, right?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one will miss that old nuisance!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The village is throwing a party to celebrate! Stoick is stunned, overwhelmed by the insensitivity. He turns to Gobber. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 52.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's... gone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah...most afternoons. But who can blame him? I mean the life of a celebrity is very rough. He can barely walk through the village without being swarmed by his new fans. Stoick is doubly confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who would've thought, eh? He has this...way with the beasts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless and Hiccup soar through a perfect blue sky. Billowing clouds rise like mountains. The ground seems miles below them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay there bud, we're gonna take this nice and slow. Hiccup checks a leather cheat sheet, clipped onto his harness. Inscribed upon it are several tail positions and their pedal position equivalents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here we go. Here we go...position three, no four. He presses the pedal, causing the tail to flare. They roll off into an arcing bank, gloriously lit by the late afternoon sun. Hiccup tucks tight against his neck, thrilled that his new harness and vest are holding. The foot controls make the tail appendage quick and responsive. He watches Toothless' every fluctuation, trying to match it with the prosthetic. Hiccup sizes up a target -- a towering arch of stone, rising from the sea. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 53.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, it's go time. It's go time. They dive toward it, lining up to pass through the arch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Come on buddy. Come on buddy! They zip through the arch. A perfect maneuver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Yes, it worked! The triumph is short-lived. They smack into one of several sea stacks as Hiccup tries to keep up with the turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. They hurtle into another rock pillar. Toothless grumbles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My fault. Toothless swats him with his 'ear' plate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah, I'm on it. (referring to the cheat
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Position four, no three. They pierce the clouds. For the first time, Hiccup can see the whole of the island below them. It shrinks with every passing second. He SWALLOWS hard and tightens his grip on the handles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Go baby! Yes! Oh, this is amazing! The wind in my... He spots the leather guide tearing free in the turbulence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (PANICKED) ... CHEAT SHEET! STOP!! Hiccup grabs frantically for the airborne sheet...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 54. ... and NABS IT before it's carried out of reach. Toothless, however, obeys the command and suddenly STOPS beating his wings. As they slow to a stop, Hiccup goes weightless. The rings of his vest float off of the harness hooks. Hiccup suddenly finds himself detached, free-falling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh gods! Oh no! Without Hiccup, the tail loses control. Hiccup and Toothless spiral downward. Toothless FIGHTS to get back under Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying to calm Toothless) Alright, okay. You just gotta kinda angle yourself. No, no...come back down towards me. Come back down-- Hiccup extends his arms and legs, giving himself as much surface area as he can. He angles back towards Toothless as the tumbling dragon WHACKS Hiccup with his wing. After a few more misses, Hiccup finally GRABS HOLD of the harness and manages to lock in -- just in time to pull Toothless out of his dive... barely shy of the tree tops. They careen past the wooded cliff and directly into a treacherous slalom course of jutting sea stacks. Hiccup pulls the cheat sheet from his teeth and attempts to check positions. It flaps violently in the turbulence, making it impossible. With no time to think, Hiccup throws it away and steers Toothless' tail on instinct... with perfect intuition. Together, they manage a tight, hair-rasing series of split- second turns, making it to the open water, unscathed. Hiccup takes a breath and glances back at the death-defying obstacle course, now safely behind them. He beams, relieved. He sits back and throws his arms up in victory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: YEEAHHH! Toothless concurs with a happy SQUEAL and a fireball. Hiccup's glee turn to dread as they fly directly into it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, come on. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 55.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup and Toothless lounge on a sprawling, deserted beach, snacking of freshly caught fish. As Hiccup cooks his over a fire, Toothless suddenly regurgitates a fish head. Hiccup smirks with forced politeness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh..no thanks. (gesturing to his fish on
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm good. Several Terrible Terrors land like seagulls, hissing and nipping at each other as they approach Toothless' pile of fish. One grabs the regurgitated fish head and drags it away. Another attempts to steal it from him. They face off and last fire balls at each other to settle the fight. Hiccup and Toothless watch, amused. That is until... Toothless spots one of his fish leaving the pile. A stealthy Terrible Terror is exposed as the thief. They tug on the fish, and it snaps back into Toothless' mouth. He swallows it back tauntingly. Irate, the little dragon paws at the ground and blast Toothless. He opens his mouth, the gas hiss comes, and Toothless fires a tiny flame straight into its mouth, causing the gas to backfire into the little dragon. It coughs up smoke and staggers away, looking ill. Hiccup laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not so fireproof on the inside, are you? Hiccup throws the hapless Terror his freshly cooked fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here you go. The appreciative little dragon gulps down the meal and approaches Hiccup cautiously. He curls up next to him. Hiccup is amazed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (PENSIVE) Everything we know about you guys is wrong. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 56. Hiccup carefully pets him... sending the Terror into an immediate, blissful sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: T - NIGHT HICCUP is lost in thought, his head laid of a desk full of Toothless drawings. Burdened with the weight of the world. Suddenly, STOICK appears in the doorway. Hiccup jumps and quickly covers up his desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad! You're back! He skirts the bench, blocking Stoick's view of Toothless, the prosthetic fin, and other drawings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gobber's not here, so... He strikes an awkwardly casual pose, trying to cover up as much as possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. I came looking for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been keeping secrets. Hiccup's legs give out. He slides, dragging the table's contents with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...have?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just how long did you think you could hide it from me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what you're...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing happens on this island without me hearing about it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh? "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 57.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So. (BEAT) Let's talk about that dragon. Blood drains from Hiccup's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh gods. Dad I'm so sorry. I was going to tell you. I just didn't know how to-- Stoick starts laughing. Big, booming. Hiccup stares, baffled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not...upset?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?! I was hoping for this!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh...you were?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And believe me, it only gets better! Just wait til you spill a Nadder's guts for the first time. Hiccup's elated expression sinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And mount your first Gronckle head on a spear. What a feeling! Stoick laughs and smacks Hiccup on the shoulder, sending him into the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really had me going there, son. All those years of the worst Viking Berk has ever seen! Odin, it was rough. I almost gave up on you! Hiccup gets back up, grimacing in the irony of it all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And all the while, you were holding out on me! Thor almighty! Stoick grabs a stool and sits. His massive frame nearly fills the tiny room. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 58.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (RELIEVED) Ahhhhh. With you doing so well in the ring, we finally have something to talk about. Pregnant pause. Hiccup averts his eyes nervously. Stoick adjusts, awkwardly clearing his throat. After a long, uncomfortable silence...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I... brought you something. He presents a horned helmet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To keep you safe in the ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. Thanks. Hiccup accepts it, looking it over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mother would've wanted you to have it. (HEARTFELT) It's half of her breast plate. Stoick taps his own helmet and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matching set. Keeps her close, y'know? Hiccup eyes the mismatched helmets, grimacing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wear it proudly. You deserve it. You've held up your end of the deal. Stoick beams with pride. Hiccup squirms. He forces a YAWN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should really get to bed. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 59.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (talking over each (talking over each
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Good! Okay. Good talk. See you back at the house. We should do this again. I'm Great. Thanks for stopping glad I stopped by, I hope you by. And for the... the uh, like the hat. breast hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well..uh..good night. Stoick leaves the room awkwardly, leaving Hiccup looking more burdened than ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gronckle hovers above the ring, hunting victims as the teen recruits scramble. Astrid ducks behind a barrier to find Hiccup already there. She forces her axe at his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay out of my way! I'm winning this thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, by all means. She darts off, CLOSING FAST on the dragon. The crowd above cheers her on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it Astrid! Hiccup stands and looks around. Amidst the crowd of onlookers, Stoick watches keenly, beaming with pride. He locks eyes with Hiccup, giving him a nod of encouragement. Hiccup adjusts his new helmet and forces a half-hearted smile. Unbeknownst to Hiccup, the Gronckle spots him and makes a bee- line toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... as she catches her breath behind a barrier. She scowls, focused, determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This time. This time for sure. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 60. With a FIERCE BATTLE-CRY she LEAPS from cover, axe cocked to throw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaaaaaaa... And as she clears the barriers, she sees that Hiccup has already laid the Gronckle out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...aaaaaaauGGGGGHHHHHHHH! No! No! Hiccup shrugs, as unhappy with the situation as she is.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: SON OF HALFTROLL RAT EATING MUNGE BUCKET

direction.raw_text: NO! NO! SON OF HALFTROLL RAT EATING MUNGE BUCKET! A loud CLACK ring out. From the crowd above, Gothi, the village elder, steps forward, tapping her staff. Everyone lights up excitedly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Wait!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, later. Gobber snags Hiccup as he attempts to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not so fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm kinda late for--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Late for what exactly? Stoick holds out his hands to silence the jabbering crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay quiet down. The elder has decided. Thrilled, Gobber stands behind Hiccup and Astrid. He points to Astrid as the crowd waits in silent anticipation. Gothi shakes her head 'no.' The crowd 'Oooohs.' Gobber then points to Hiccup. The elder nods an affirmative 'yes.' The crowd erupts in cheers. Astrid turns a seething, deadly glare on Hiccup. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 61.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've done it! You've done it, Hiccup! You get to kill the dragon!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha, ha! That's my boy! Hiccup is hoisted onto the recruits' shoulders and carried out to the cheering spectators...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heh, heh. Oh yeah! Yes! I can't wait. I am so...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... leaving. We're leaving. Let's pack up. Looks like you and me are taking a little vacation, forever. Toothless is nowhere in sight. Hiccup sets down his basket and opens it up, his head clouded with troubles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh..man...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Hiccup looks up to the sound of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sitting on the rock right in front of him, sharpening her axe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (SHOCKED) Aggh! What the-- (RECOMPOSING) What are you doing here? She hops off the rock and back him down, spinning her axe threateningly. Hiccup's eyes dart around nervously, searching for Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to know what's going on. No one just gets as good as you do. Especially you. Start talking! Are you training with someone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh...training? She grabs him by his odd-looking harness. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 62.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It better not involve... this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know this looks really bad, but you see...this is, uh... They hear a RUSTLE coming from the other side of the cove. Astrid DROPS Hiccup to the ground and sets off to investigate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (PANICKED) You're right! You're right. I'm through with the lies. I've been making... outfits. So you got me. It's time everyone knew. Drag me back. Go ahead. Here we go. He puts her hand back on his harness, getting her to 'drag him back.' Astrid BENDS Hiccups hand backwards, driving him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AAAAUUGGGHHH! Why would you do that?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's for the lies. Astrid pounces the hilt of her axe off of Hiccup's laid-out body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And THAT'S for everything else. Hiccup's YELP is answered with A GROWL, coming from the other side of the cove. Astrid looks up to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Toothless pounces toward them, snarling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh man. She dives onto Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get down! Run! Run! Astrid pulls her axe, ready to take on Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 63. Hiccup knocks Astrid's cocked axe to the ground, out of reach, then stops Toothless short of crushing her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. It's okay! It's okay... Toothless pulls up short and lands hard, SPRAYING Astrid with sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CALMING) She's a friend. Toothless snorts in disagreement. Astrid is frozen. Toothless looks from her to Hiccup and back to her, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO ASTRID) You just scared him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I scared him!? Hiccup makes a abe quieta motion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (INTENSE WHISPER) Who is him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Astrid, Toothless. Toothless, Astrid. Astrid backs away, eyeing Hiccup and Toothless together with pure disgust. She turns and RUNS for the village.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're dead. Satisfied with Astrid's departure, Toothless turns away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO TOOTHLESS) Where do you think you're going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: races through the trees. A large shadow overtakes her. She is suddenly SNATCHED into the air. Astrid SCREAMS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh great Odin's ghost, this is it! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 64. Hiccup and Toothless fly Astrid to the top of a towering pine. It bows and creaks under their weight as Astrid dangles a hundred feet in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup! Get me down from here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to give me a chance to explain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not listening to ANYTHING you have to say!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I won't speak. Just let me show you. Hiccup extends a hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, Astrid. She eyes him and the dragon, then the ground far, far below. After a moment, she swats Hiccup's outstretched hand away and reluctantly climbs over the pedal, lines, and harness. She settles behind Hiccup, avoiding as much contact as possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now get me down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless? Down. Gently. Toothless leers mischievously. He spreads his wings slowly. With a WHOP, they fill with the updraft. Toothless releases the tree, tucks in his legs, and HOVERS in place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See? Nothing to be afraid of. Toothless suddenly LAUNCHES straight upward. Astrid SCREAMS. The acceleration is tremendous. Every downbeat bucks the saddle, heaving them into the sky, doubling their speed like a rocket. Astrid is thrown backward. She SCREAMS and hugs Hiccup for dear life, squeezing the breath out of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! What is wrong with you?! Bad dragon! (mortified; to Astrid) He's not usually like this. Oh no... "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 65. Toothless ROLLS and PLUMMETS toward the coastline far below. Astrid SCREAMS. Toothless rockets over the ocean waves, deliberately dipping them in the froth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless, what are you doing?! We need her to like us! Toothless rockets skyward and begins tumbling head over tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And now the spinning. Thank you for nothing you useless reptile. Astrid clamps her hand over her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay! I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Just get me off of this thing. Astrid is defeated, her aggressive energy gone. Satisfied, Toothless relents. They level off and head up into the clouds. Astrid opens her eyes again, and looks out over a world she'd never dreamed of. She reaches out and touches clouds, pierces columns ablaze in golden hues, and floats over a vast, alien sky- scape. Her terror is replaced by wonder. She grins, despite herself. Toothless rises above a blanket of clouds...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and levels off under a starry sky. They emerge from a blanket of clouds under the dancing Northern Lights, shimmering in ribbons across the vast sky. Below them, Berk's torches flicker in the inky darkness. The new perspective is breathtaking. Astrid tucks her arms into Hiccup's vest, burying her chin into his shoulder. The moment is not lost on either of them. Hiccup smiles nervously. Toothless climbs past Berk's tallest peaks and heads out over open water, leaving the village lights behind them. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 66.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright I admit it. This is pretty cool. It's... amazing. (BEAT) He's amazing. Astrid carefully reaches down and pats Toothless' side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what now? Hiccup groans. It's a problem without an answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup, your final exam is tomorrow. You know you're going to have to kill... (WHISPERED) ... kill a dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't remind me. A strange, unearthly din approaches. Toothless' ear plates suddenly stand on end. Panicked, he abruptly dives, dipping into cloud cover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! What's happening? What is it? Toothless BARKS at him. 'Quiet!' Suddenly, out of the dense cloud, a Monstrous Nightmare emerges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get down! Hiccup and Astrid duck. The Nightmare calls out. A Zippleback appears to the other side of Toothless, boxing him in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. (BEAT) Toothless. You've got to get us out of here, bud. Toothless HISSES. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 67. Other dragons, previously invisible in the thick clouds, appear all around them. HUNDREDS of them, all carrying fish and game in their talons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (WHISPERED) It looks like they're hauling in their kill. The Zippleback eyes them ravenously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does that make us? The dragons BANK and dive in formation, plummeting through the thickening fog and weaving between towering, craggy sea stacks. They emerge at the base of a massive volcanic caldera, glowing with rivulets of lava. The flock of dragons fall into rank, funneling through a crack, and zipping through a winding tunnel. It gives way to a vast, steamy inner chamber, tiered with pocky shelves. Dragons of all breeds lay about, nested in hordes. The arriving dragons fly in, dropping the fish and game into a central pit, glowing red and shrouded in mist. Hiccup is amazed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What my dad wouldn't give to find this. Toothless peels away from the procession, landing on a small shadowy shelf to keep a low-profile. Hiccup and Astrid peek around, taking in the busy hive of sorts. They watch as the food continues to be dropped into the pit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's satisfying to know that all of our food has been dumped down a hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're not eating any of it. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 68. Last to arrive is a dim-witted Gronckle. It hovers over the pit and regurgitates his paltry contribution -- a pathetic little fish. As it falls into the steamy pit, a terrible ROAR rings out. The Gronckle tries to flee, but before it can, a gargantuan dragon head juts from the steamy pit and SNAPS it out of the air. Swallowing it back whole. Hiccup and Astrid recoil, terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that? The monstrous beast SNIFFS the air, seemingly aware of them. It nears the ledge where Toothless is hiding... and ROARS. Several dragons take flight in fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright buddy, we gotta get out of here. Now! Toothless takes flight, barely evading the monster's snapping jaws. The behemoth dragon lunges for them, snatching a Zippleback out of the air instead. Toothless disappears into the winged exodus as thousands of dragons flee the caldera in fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - LATER Toothless glides into the cove and touches down on the moonlit beach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (her mind reeling, talking Hiccup's ear off) No, no, it totally makes sense. It's like a giant beehive. They're the workers... and that's their queen. It controls them. She leaps off of Toothless and runs toward the village.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's find your dad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no! Not yet. They'll... kill Toothless. (BEAT) (MORE) "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 69.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Astrid, we have to think this through carefully. Astrid eyes him, incredulous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup, we just discovered the dragons' nest...the thing we've been after since Vikings first sailed here. And you want to keep it a secret? To protect your pet dragon? Are you serious? Hiccup stands firm, resolute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Astrid's taken aback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. (BEAT) Then what do we do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give me until tomorrow. I'll figure something out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Astrid PUNCHES Hiccup in the arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's for kidnapping me. Hiccup looks to Toothless for support. Toothless SNORTS, dismissive. Astrid grabs him. He braces for another hit. She KISSES Hiccup on the cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's for, everything else. In the awkward wake of the moment, Astrid hurries off... leaving Hiccup RUBBING his cheek, stunned. Toothless hobbles up, eyeing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you looking at? "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 70.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The grounds have been transformed. Banners and flags flap in the morning sun. Surrounding the ring, a festive crowd had gathered. All of Berk has turned out for the event.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (aloud to the crowd) Well, I can show my face in public again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (PLAYFUL) If someone had told me that in a few short weeks, Hiccup would go from being, well... Hiccup, to placing first in dragon training... I would've tied him to a mast and shipped him off for fear he'd gone mad. Yes! And you know it! (BEAT) But here we are. And no one's more surprised...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: standing at the entrance to the ring, listening, looking burdened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... or more proud than I am. Today, my boy becomes a Viking. TODAY, HE BECOMES ONE OF US!
direction.name: direction

result.ToD: TODAY, HE BECOMES ONE OF US
result.heading: TODAY, HE BECOMES ONE OF US

direction.raw_text: and ROARS. Astrid approaches Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful with that dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: the roaring crowd) It's not the dragon I'm worried about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you going to do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put an end to this. She eyes him, dubious. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 71.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to try. (BEAT) Astrid. If something goes wrong... just make sure they don't find Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will. Just promise me it won't go wrong. Hiccup can't. Gobber approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's time, Hiccup. Knock him dead. Hiccup puts his helmet on and enters the ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and HOLLERING from the stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show 'em how it's done, my man! Hiccup locks eyes with Stoick. Stoick nods with a smile. Hiccup returns a half-smile. Takes a deep breath. He hoists a shield onto his forearm and selects his weapon from a rack of many -- a small dagger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hrmph. I would've gone for the hammer. Hiccup turns to face a bolted, heavy door. Takes a deep breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm ready. The door bolt is raised. The crowd grows quiet... Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The doors blast open with a stream of sticky fire. Followed by a Monstrous Nightmare, coated in flames. It tears out of its cave like an irate bull -- as the crowd roars and jeers. It climbs the walls and chain enclosure like a bat, hissing at the provoking crowd and blasting fire. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 72. It spots Hiccup and descends, leering and licking the flaming drool from its lips. The crowd grows silent, bracing for the big fight. With the Monstrous Nightmare's eyes locked upon him, Hiccup deliberately drops his shield and dagger stepping away from them. The dragon pauses, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: also confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is he doing? The dragon presses closer, snorting. Hiccup extends his open hand. It snarls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay. It's okay. The dragon continues to pace, focused on... HICCUP'S HELMET. Hiccup realizes, then reaches up and removes it. Taking a breath to acknowledge the point of no return, he tosses the helmet aside. It hits the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not one of them.
direction.name: direction
