direction.raw_text: and MURMURS race through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as all eyes turn to him. He's welling with upset. Hiccup avoids Stoick's glare and remains focused on the Nightmare, holding his hand out. It paces around him, calming down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop the fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I need you all to see this. The crowd gets restless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're not what we think they are. We don't have to kill them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 73. Stoick whacks his hammer against the iron enclosure, rattling the arena with a terrible reverberating clatter. Spooked, the Nightmare snaps at Hiccup's outstretched hand. Hiccup YELPS and springs backward. The spell is broken. The Nightmare reacts to Hiccup's sudden movements and blasts another stream of fire. Hiccup SCREAMS and barely dives out of reach.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: STOICK I SAID STOP THE FIGHT

direction.raw_text: His ear plates shoot up. Panic flares in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup scrambles around the ring. The Nightmare pursues, snapping and springing from ground to wall. Stoick pushes through the crowd, rushing to the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out of my way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup! Astrid wedges her axe under the arena gate and squeezes through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless bounds to the cove walls, clawing them in desperation. It seems he's as trapped as before, but with an incredible BURST of effort he HOOKS a claw over the upper lip of the stone wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A narrow stream of fire narrowly avoids Hiccup as he continues to dash around the ring, evading the Monstrous Nightmare. Desperate, he goes to the weapon rack in an attempt to arm himself, but the Nightmare quickly destroys the rack and closes in on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless tears through the woods, bounding like panther and taking to the air in short bursts. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 74.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stoick wrenches the grated door to the arena and jumps through. The Monstrous Nightmare is only a few feet behind Hiccup. Astrid is now in the ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup! She picks up a hammer and hurls it at the Monstrous Nightmare, hitting it in the head. It turns its attention to Astrid, and begins chasing her. Stoick raises the arena gate, waving her toward it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way! Astrid makes it through, but the Nightmare BLASTS the doorway, cutting Hiccup off. It pounces on him and prepares to finish him off. Suddenly, a terrible roar pierces the din.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Night Fury! Get down! Toothless bounds over the crowd and BLASTS a hole through the chain enclosure. He flies through it and disappears in the boiling smoke. The Vikings rush to railings... in time to see a flurry of wings cutting through the dissipating smoke. Toothless and the Nightmare tumble into the clear, locked in a toothy, vicious fight. Toothless kicks the Nightmare off and plants himself between Hiccup and it. The Nightmare snarls, circling them. Toothless lunges and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... causing the Nightmare to relent and back away. To everyone's shock and horror, Hiccup gets to his feet and grabs Toothless protectively.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, Toothless, go. Get out of here! The crowd is gob-smacked, growing livid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Night Fury! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 75. Hiccup tries to shoo Toothless away in vain. Vikings begin pouring clambering through the enclosure and dropping into the ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go! GO!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take it alive! Stoick grabs an axe and charges into the arena. Astrid calls out to him, panicked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stoick no!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad! No! He won't hurt you! The other Vikings surround and attack Toothless. He tosses them aside like rag dolls, his eyes focused on Stoick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, don't! You're only making it worse! Stoick raises his hammer as he charges for Toothless. Toothless ducks and pounces on him. They tumble end over end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! STOP! He pins Stoick and inhales. The familiar hiss of gas builds. Everyone braces...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NO! Toothless swallows back the blast and turns to Hiccup, not understanding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him! The crowd rushes him, piling on, and taking Toothless down. Astrid holds Hiccup back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Please...just don't hurt him. Please don't hurt him. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 76. Stoick gets to his feet, fuming, shaken. A Viking presents Stoick with an axe. He eyes Toothless a moment, then pushes the axe back into the Viking's hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put it with the others! His burning glare turn to Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Being shoved into the dank, dimmed hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The massive doors rattle and echo. Stoick pushes past him. He paces against a backdrop of shadowy tapestries and carved pillars -- a legacy of heroes, all peering down in angered judgement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should have known. I should have seen the signs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We had a deal! Stoick pauses to say something, but stops short. He SNORTS and resumes pacing, repeating the cycle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know we did... but that was before... ughh, it's all so messed up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So everything in the ring. A trick? A lie? He stomps toward Hiccup. Stops short and points, fighting back words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I screwed up. I should have told you before now. Take this out on me, be mad at me, but please... just don't hurt Toothless. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 77.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The dragon? That's what you're worried about? Not the people you almost killed?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was just protecting me! He's not dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They've killed HUNDREDS OF US!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And we've killed THOUSANDS OF THEM! They defend themselves, that's all! They raid us because they have to! If they don't bring enough food back, they'll be eaten themselves. (BEAT) There's something else on their island dad...it's a dragon like-- Stoick HUFFS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --Their island? He stomps back... pointing an accusing finger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you've been to the nest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did I say nest? Hiccup goes silent -- he said too much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you find it?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... I didn't. Toothless did. Only a dragon can find the island. Stoick GLARES. A moment passes, then an idea takes form on his face. His eyes flare. Hiccup watches, realizing. Stoick stomps toward the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no. No, Dad. No. Hiccup chases after him, panicked. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 78.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad. It's not what you think. You don't know what you're up against. It's like nothing you've ever seen. He grabs Stoick by the arm, tugging with all his might. He has no effect whatsoever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad. Please. I promise you that you can't win this one. Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Dad. No. For once in your life,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ?! He throws Hiccup off of him, SWATTING him to the floor. Icy stillness. Hiccup stares back, stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've thrown your lot in with them. You're not a Viking. (BEAT) You're not my son. Stoick pushes through the door, leaving Hiccup alone, devastated.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: WOULD YOU PLEASE JUST LISTEN TO ME

direction.raw_text: (CALLING OUT) Ready the ships!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stoick staggers on the steps, breaking inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Broken-down catapults and trebuchets are bundled up and lowered from the cliffs. Below on the docks, Vikings load the heavy artillery into the hulls of awaiting ships. Children and the elderly gather to on the walkways to wave apprehensive farewells to the departing warriors. Lastly, Toothless is loaded aboard Stoick's ship, chained down to a palette, muzzled, and restrained with a weighty neck ring. He looks exhausted, miserable. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 79. Stoick crosses to the bow as the ship pushes off and joins the amassed armada of ships adrift in the harbor. Stoick's brow is furrowed, all warmth drained away. He turns west and glares at the horizon with cold determination.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Set sail! We head for Helheim's Gate. He then notices HICCUP watching from his familiar cliff-side perch beyond the village. Their eyes meet, full of hurt and regret. Hiccup slowly shakes his head in warning. Stoick breaks the stare and turns to Toothless, fuming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lead us home, Devil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watching. He's powerless to stop what is happening, but won't leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still standing there. The ships have cleared the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: UP to reveal Astrid is standing behind him. She approaches cautiously and stands beside him in silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a mess. Hiccup doesn't respond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must feel horrible. You've lost everything. Your father, your tribe, your best friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you for summing that up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why couldn't I have killed that dragon when I found him in the woods. It would have been better for everyone. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 80.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep. The rest of us would have done it. (BEAT) So why didn't you? Hiccup just shakes his head - he really doesn't know. Astrid's eyes glimmer. She wants something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. I couldn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not an answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why is this so important to you all of a sudden?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I want to remember what you say right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (angry, loud) Oh for the love of -- I was a coward! I was weak. I wouldn't kill a dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said 'wouldn't' that time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever! I wouldn't! Three hundred years and I'm the first Viking who wouldn't kill a dragon!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First to ride one, though. Hiccup blinks. He never looked at it that way before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So... "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 81.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I wouldn't kill him because he looked as frightened as I was. (BEAT) I looked at him and I saw myself. Astrid turns to face the open sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bet he's really frightened now. (PROVOKING) What are you going to do about it? Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Probably something stupid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. But you've already done that. Another beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then something crazy. Astrid smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's more like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The armada coasts toward a shroud of heavy fog, hung like drapes from a low-hanging, ominous sky. The ships enter, one by one. Visibility drops immediately. Flanking ships becomes ghosts. The armada disappears, drawn into the blinding mist. Complete whiteout. Nothing remains but the eerie creaking of wood on water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: at the bow of his ship. He taps his fingers on the gunwale, then looks back at Toothless impatiently. Weighed down with chains, Toothless seems unresponsive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sound your positions. Stay within earshot. Shouts pour in from all directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 82.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One length to your stern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On your starboard flank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three widths to port.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahead, at your bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Haven't a clue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: straining into the fog as the calls continue. Massive, jagged sea stacks begin to emerge, threatening to rip the ships to shreds. Gobber approaches him, speaking under his breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen... Stoick... I was overhearing some of the men just now and, well, some of them are wondering what it is we're up to here -- not me of course, I know you're always the man with the plan
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: but some, not me, are wondering if there is in fact a plan at all, what it might be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find the nest and take it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. Of course. Send them running. The old Viking fall-back. Nice and simple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhh. Stoick notices that Toothless' ear plates are at the alert, quietly reacting to inaudible sounds. Stoick crosses to the stern of the ship and grabs the tiller, moving the helmsman out of the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Step aside. Stoick pulls the ship into a turn, covertly following Toothless' head movements. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 83. The ship barely misses a jagged outcrop that suddenly appears out of the soupy fog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bear to port. The order is called out from ship to ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The bow barely makes it past another sea stack. Stoick continues to follow Toothless' cues, undeterred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup raises the bolt on the Monstrous Nightmare's pen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) If you're planning on getting eaten, I'd definitely go with the Gronckle. Hiccup turns to see his fellow recruits, watching him with folded arms. Tuffnut steps forward with a scowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were wise to seek help from the world's most deadly weapon. (BEAT) It's me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love this plan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're crazy. (SULTRY) I like that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So? What is the plan? Hiccup smiles, glowing in the support of his friends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ships follow in line through the gauntlet of rocks as orders are whispered from ship to ship. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 84. A dragon head looms out of the fog. The men recoil... only to discover that it's a wrecked ship, impaled high on a gnarled sea stack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. I was wondering where that went. A clicking buzz becomes audible, growing louder. It fills the sky, converging in one general direction. Stoick sniffs the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay low and ready your weapons. Stoick's ship suddenly JERKS to a halt as the keel burrows into shallow black sand. Stoick hops overboard, landing on a sprawling beach. The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: suddenly STOPS. Above him, a craggy volcano towers into the gloom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're here. Behind him, several dragon-headed bows pierce the fog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup steps back from the door, drawing the Monstrous Nightmare out of its cave. It snorts, stepping into the ring, calmed by Hiccup's outstretched hand -- focused on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... bewildered, in awe. Snotlout nervously reaches for a spear laying near his foot. Astrid stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-uh. Hiccup slows to a stop in front of the teens, with the Nightmare inches from his outstretched hand. He reaches over and grabs Snotlout's trembling hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! What are you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax. It's okay... it's okay. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 85. Hiccup replaces his outstretched hand with Snotlout's, putting him in control of the massive beast. The Nightmare snorts, but remains calm. Snotlout, by contrast, chuckles nervously -- it's at once terrifying and amazing. The others watch, spellbound. Hiccup turns and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going?! Hiccup pulls a bundle of rope from a supply box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to need something to help you hold on. The teens eye each other apprehensively, and look up to reveal...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: standing in the ring, facing the teens expectantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON Tree trunks, being sharpened and planted into the sand at angled rows. Boulders being loaded into catapult baskets. And a war plan being scratched in the sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looms over it, looking determined. His generals are at his sides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When we crack this mountain open, all hell is going to break loose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In my undies. Good thing I brought extras. Stoick TURNS to face the men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No matter how this ends, it ends today. He walks toward the base of the volcano wall, back by several hundred warriors. He raises his arm and drops it. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 86. A line of catapults UNLEASH their two-ton loads into the cliff wall. It cracks and flakes away. Several more hits tear away at the hollow shell of hardened lava. A final boulder shatters the fractured wall, creating a deep, dark opening to the cavern within. Silence. Stock raises his hand, makes a gesture. A flaming bushel is launched into the dark, lighting the wall... CHOKED WITH DRAGONS. Stoick pulls his hammer and rushes into the cave, brazen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (War cries and slashing efforts) In a chaotic flurry, the dragons suddenly rush out like bats from a cave. The take to the air, bypassing the axe-swinging Vikings and fleeing the island in a mass exodus. The battle-ready Vikings drop their weapons, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that it? Above the island, dragons POUR from every crevice, fleeing to the sky. The sound of screeching dragons fades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Cheering as one)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've done it! Stoick doesn't celebrate. Something is not right. He HEARS something. Stoick turns to peer down the dark throat of the cavern. A deep, rumbling ROAR echoes from the cavern. The ground underfoot TREMBLES. The ships rock. Their sails fill with a blast of air. The cheering stops. Stoick's expression sinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't over. Form your ranks! Hold together! The men SCRAMBLE to organize themselves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get clear! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 87. The ground CRACKS. Stone tears away, cascading like an avalanche. And through the settling debris, the silhouette of a gargantuan dragon emerges -- THE RED DEATH. Stirred and furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beard of Thor...what is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Odin help us. (BEAT) Catapults! The Vikings score direct hits. The burning stones BOUNCE off the dragon's skin. The Red Death focuses on the catapults. It crushes the first one - smashing it and its crew, rattling the beach underfoot. Stoick races toward the second catapult. He LEAPS and pushes a Viking out of the way just before the dragon crushes him under his forepaw. The Vikings scramble in all directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get to the ships!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! NO! The Red Death BLASTS the ships like a mile-long flamethrower. The sails are torched. Vikings dive overboard and masts come down. Gobber Joins Stoick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heh. Smart, that one. Stoick looks up and down the beach for an answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was a fool. The monster raises its head to the sky and BELLOWS. The sound SHAKES the beach, knocking Vikings off their feet. This island is his. Stoick stops a Viking General. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 88.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lead the men to the far side of the island.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. (turns to the others) Everybody to the far side of the island! The Vikings scatter into the rocks like ants. Satisfied with the ships destruction, The Red Death turns its attention back to the Vikings. They seem to have vanished. It SNIFFS the air, searching for their scent. Gobber drops in beside Stoick, like two soldiers in a trench. Fire blasts over head, causing them to duck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gobber, go with the men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I'll stay, just in case you're thinking of doing something crazy. Stoick grabs him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can buy them a few minutes if I give that thing someone to hunt. Gobber removes Stoick's hand. Clenches his forearm, determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I can double that time. Stoick grins. Friends to the bitter end. They BREAK COVER and dash into the open, SPLITTING UP. Stoick rips a sharpened post from the ground and hurls it into the monster's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! It spots both of them. He fuels up to fire, glancing back and forth between the two men. He focuses on Stoick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Fight me! "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 89.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, me! The Red Death remains focused on Stoick - this is it. It rears back and inhales. Gas begins to amass, when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! A BLAST explodes against the back of The Red Death's head. It turns distracted, as... ... a Nadder punches through the flames, banking across the sky. Followed by a Monstrous Nightmare, a Zippleback, and a Gronckle. They roll in unison, revealing the recruits riding on their backs. Hiccup leads, with Astrid clinging to his waist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watch slack-jawed, in awe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ruff, Tuff, watch your backs! Move Fishlegs! The monster shakes off the blast and snaps in their wake. Hiccup directs his squadron out of harm's way. They climb out of reach and circle each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at us, we're on a dragon! We're on dragons, all of us!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up, let's move it! The dragons climb past the Red Death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gobber hobbles over to Stoick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every bit the boar-headed, stubborn Viking you ever were. Stoick is speechless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group circles over the dragon's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fishlegs, break it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Heavily armored skull and tail made for bashing and crushing. (MORE) "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 90.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steer clear of both. Small eyes, large nostrils. Relies on hearing and smell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Lout, Legs, hang in its blind spot. Make some noise, keep it confused. Ruff, Tuff, find out if it has a shot limit. Make it mad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's my specialty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Since when? Everyone knows I'm more irritating. See. (IRRITATING SOUNDS)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just do what I told you. I'll be back as soon as I can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, we got it covered!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Hiccup and Astrid peel away. The teens bank and dive toward the monster, splitting up. The Twins race alongside the monster's head, taunting it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Troll!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Butt Elf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bride of Grendel! The Red Death unloads a spray of fire at the twins. They barely dodge it. Fishlegs and Snotlout hang behind its eyes, banging away at their shields, making a racket. The Red Death opens all SIX of its eyes, spotting them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, this thing doesn't have a blind spot. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 91.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... searching for Toothless. Hiccup spots him among the burning ships.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There! He steers the Nadder over the deck and hands Astrid the reins. He lines up his jump... and hops off, guarding his face from the flames. He lands on the burning deck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO ASTRID) Go help the others! She and the Nadder take off. As Hiccup fights his way to Toothless. He unbuckles the muzzle. Toothless shrieks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, hold on. Hold on. He gets to work on the chains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They clang their weapons against their shields, making the monster wince.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's working. The huge beast starts to sway its head dizzily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! It's working.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DOWN to reveal that the noise is also confusing the Gronckle and the Monstrous Nightmare. Both dragons lose their bearings. The Red Death thrashes, knocking Snotlout off of his dragon and onto the monster's gigantic head. Snotlout bounces across the top and comes to a stop just shy of the hundred foot drop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agghh! Fishlegs' Gronckle goes down in a spin of confusion. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 92.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've lost power on the Gronckle. Snotlout! Do something! He hurls Snotlout his hammer. The Gronkle crashes and skids to a stop...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm okay! ... then flips over, crushing Fishlegs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (FEEBLE) Less okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... who eyes the Red Death's gigantic, veiny eyes. He raises the hammer...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't miss! ... and hammers the monster's eyes, playing whack-a-mole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong buddy, got something in your eye? Astrid flies by on her Nadder, catching Snotlout in all his heroics.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! You're the Viking! Snotlout grins, finally vindicated in her eyes. In his distraction, he gets thrown and lands heavily on one of the Red Death's spines -- clinging precariously. A close call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The monster's tail sweeps across the burning ships, snapping masts like twigs. We follow one down as it crashes onto a deck, revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Working at the chains. He can't budge them. Fire licks at his clothes. He looks up to see... "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 93.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blasting at the teens, enraged. The monster's giant foot crashes through frame, smashing the bow under its impressive weight. Hiccup and Toothless are thrown into the water in a maelstrom of burning planks and rigging.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup swims toward Toothless. They're both caught in a mess of rigging, being dragged down. The heavy palette settles into the rocky bottom like an anchor. Toothless has stopped struggling. Hiccup takes one more hopeless tug at the chains - he's almost out of air. Suddenly, a meaty hand grabs Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: explodes to the surface, pulling Hiccup to the shoreline through flaming debris. He lays him down, under the shelter of an overhanging rock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad... Stoick dives back into the water between flaming flotsam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: drowning. Stoick appears in front of him. Toothless freezes. Stoick tears the chains off of the yoke and lets it float free. Momentary stillness. They eye each other, through the churned up bubbles. Toothless lunges out of the bars -- grabbing Stoick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! In an explosion of sea water, Toothless lands on the shore, setting Stoick down and releasing him. Hiccup is awed. The ground rumbles underfoot. The monster screeches. Its massive claws stomp around in the smoke. Stoick gives way as Toothless mounts the rock and raises his wings. He turns to Hiccup and SNORTS - a Let's go.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it, bud. Hiccup climbs onto Toothless and buckles himself in. Stoick grabs his arm. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 94.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup. I'm sorry...for everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah...me too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to go up there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're Vikings. It's an occupational hazard. They exchange smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm proud to call you my son. Hiccup beams, taken aback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks dad. Stoick lets go of Hiccup's arm. Hiccup spurs Toothless on, charged with his father's belief in him. They rocket into the sky as Stoick watches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Astrid sees Toothless streaking through the sky, gaining altitude.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's up! She turns to Ruffnut and Tuffnut, who are ARGUING and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get Snotlout out of there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the twins look over to see Snotlout stranded on the monster's head. They eye each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on it! I'm on it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on it first! I'm ahead of you. The twins spot Snotlout on the giant dragon and steer their Zippleback in his direction. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 95.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Let me drive! The twins peel off, ARGUING as they race each other to the monster. Snotlout sees the Zippleback diving toward him and DASHES down the Red Death's head. He runs up the end of its horn... As the twins sweep past, both missing him... but perfectly snatching him where the necks merge. Ruff and Tuff eye each other, surprised and impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe that worked. The Red Death spots Astrid and INHALES, preparing to blast. She and her Nadder get caught in the suction, pulled toward the monster's gaping mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Vikings watch with dread. They hear the familiar whir of the...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Night Fury! Get down!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A massive BLAST jolts the Red Death's head sideways. Astrid is thrown clear of its mouth... AND her Nadder. She tumbles through the air. The ground races toward her, when... She's suddenly CAUGHT by the leg. She looks up to see Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you get her? Toothless grunts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They fly over the crowd of Vikings and set Astrid down, mid- run. They circle back to reengage - a black speck against the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 96. Hiccup and Toothless rocket past the Red Death's head and climb, higher and higher.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That thing has wings! Okay, let's see if it can use them! Hiccup pulls Toothless into a turn. They plummet, gaining tremendous speed. The wind buffets them as they target the Red Death as super sonic speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Toothless unloads a fireball against the Red Death's head. It goes down with a rumble as they climb anew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Vikings shield themselves from the dust of the fallen monster... as its wings unfold and extend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup looks back as they put distance between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think that did it? Suddenly, the enraged behemoth RISES into frame... flapping its wings furiously. A daunting sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, he can fly. Hiccup and Toothless DIVE into the tangled sea stacks - they weave through the rock like rabbits through a briar. The Red Death SNAPS at them, but cannot reach them. Hiccup and Toothless PULL AHEAD. The Red Death SMASHES through the canopy of rock and pulls in behind Toothless. He BURSTS THROUGH fifty-foot formations like they were saplings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stoick, Gobber, and the Teens watch as Hiccup and Toothless streak past, weaving through sea stacks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woohoo! Yeah! A moment later the Red Death SMASHES the sea stacks to dust in hot pursuit. The Vikings mood is quenched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 97. Hiccup and Toothless can't slow the monster down. Hiccup eyes the clouds above. An idea hits him. He locks eyes with Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay Toothless, time to disappear. Toothless PULLS into a steep climb, heading toward the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on bud! The Red Death follows, closing in fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hearing the gas) Here it comes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! They narrowly dodge a column of flame and smoke. They reach the low-hanging clouds and pierce them. The monster follows, immediately losing them in the hampered visibility. It roars irritably. From out of nowhere, Toothless DIVES at the huge dragon,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and PUNCTURING a hole in its wing. Toothless and Hiccup are gone again before the dragon can get a shot at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Vikings stare up at the sky listening to the resounding
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and watching FLASHES light up the clouds. Gobber places a hand on Stoick's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and TOOTHLESS dive in again and again, using the clouds to hide and surprise as they puncture the monster's wings. It BELLOWS in frustration and WHIRLS around, unleashing fire blindly, in all directions. Hiccup sees the glow of fire cutting towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch out! The random blast CLIPS Toothless' tail. It's heavily damaged. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 98.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, time's up. Let's see if this works. He pulls Toothless into a turn. They fly directly into the Red Death's face, taunting it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Is that the best you can do!? Toothless utters an insult too, and they jackknife into a steep dive. The Red Death pursues. Toothless PUMPS his wings, racing faster than he's ever gone before. Hiccup and Toothless stay just ahead of the Red Death
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: no longer trying to evade it. Hiccup glances back to check the tail - it's disintegrating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay with me buddy. We're good. Just a little bit longer. The Red Death closes the gap. Hiccup tucks in and holds Toothless steady -- allowing the monster to set its sights on them. It narrows its eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold, Toothless. The Red Death OPENS his mouth. The familiar gas HISS emanates from his throat -- ignition is coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NOW! Hiccup HITS the PEDALS HARD as Toothless extends one wing. They PIVOT in place, hurtling directly into the Red Death's mouth. Toothless FIRES point blank down the monster's throat. Its amassing gas is ignited, BACKFIRING into the monster, erupting in a chain of blasts throughout its body. Hiccup and Toothless BURST from the clouds, the Red Death hot on their tail, exploding from within. It glances forward and sees the ground rushing up. It throws open its wings, attempting to put on the brakes, but the punctured, damaged wings can't stop its momentum. As the Red Death chokes on the expanding fireball, he sees Toothless suddenly pull out of the dive, streaking up, past its head. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 99. The Red Death HITS the ground, head-first. It EXPLODES like the Hindenburg. Hiccup and Toothless weave through the monster's massive back plates, wings, and flailing legs -- a high-speed recall of the FREE FALL slalom run. The expanding fireball races toward them, about to swallow them. They manage to clear the obstacles. Hiccup glances back. They're outrunning the fireball. He looks forward just in time to see the monster's massive club tail careening toward them. He tries to shift their direction. The last shreds of Toothless' tail tear away. Hiccup's pedals go DEAD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No. Hiccup and Toothless can't maneuver - they're dead in the air. The giant club tail CLIPS Toothless, TEARING Hiccup from the harness and sending him tumbling against the backdrop of the fast-approaching fireball. Toothless STRUGGLES with all his might to reach the unconscious Hiccup. But the fireball swallows them both.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Vikings watch in horror as Hiccup and Toothless disappear into the boiling inferno.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A whiteout of ash. And through it comes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup? Hiccup!? Stoick appears, searching desperately. Everything is scorched. Even the ground is smoking from the terrible heat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup!? Son!? Through the ash, Stoick the motionless silhouette of Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (GRAVE) Hiccup. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 100. He hurries to the dragon's side. Toothless is roughed up, but conscious. His scorched saddle, however, is vacant. Stoick looks to the sky in despair. He buckles at the knees, overwhelmed by the loss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh son...I did this... Astrid pushes through the crowd, her eyes welling up. Followed by Gobber. They flank Stoick as he kneels, slumped over. Behind them, a ring of Vikings form, keeping a respectful distance. As the dust and smoke clear, a ring of wild dragons can also be seen, gathering just behind and between the Vikings. Toothless stirs and groggily rolls his head toward Stoick. Their eyes meet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry... Toothless unfolds his wings, revealing Hiccup, unconscious, clutched safely against his chest. Stoick's eyes widen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup. He scoops Hiccup into his arms. Listens to his heart. Bursts into relieved laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's alive! (TO TOOTHLESS) You brought him back alive! The crowd roars. Followed by the dragons. The Vikings look around to find themselves surrounded. Stoick leans close to Toothless, meeting him eye to eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (PRIVATELY) Thank you... for saving my son. Gobber looks Hiccup up and down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you know... most of him. Stoick glances back at him. Gobber shrugs, redirecting his eyes toward... "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 101.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: asleep, his head on a pillow. Healing scars on his face show that maybe a week or two have passed. Toothless hovers over him, WHINING and GRUMBLING impatiently. Hiccup stirs. Opens his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hey Toothless. Toothless excitedly nuzzles and nudges Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay! I'm happy to see you too, bud. Now just-- Toothless steps on his groin, causing Hiccup to sit BOLT UPRIGHT with a YELP. He looks around, confounded. He's in his bed, moved beside the fire pit on the main floor of his house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm in my house. (re: Toothless, leaning over him, excited) You're in my house. Toothless TEARS around the room, knocking things over, far too big for the space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh...does my dad know you're in here?! Toothless pauses at the foot of the bed, tongue wagging. He eyes the rafters... and LEAPS UP onto them, brimming with 'happy dog' energy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (DISTRESSED) Okay, okay -- no Toothless! Aw, come on... Hiccup shifts to get out of bed... then pauses... sensing that something is wrong. He peels back the covers slowly. What he sees startles, horrifies, and overwhelms him -- all at once. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 102.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His booted foot touches down. Followed by a mechanical prosthetic in place of his second leg. It's an ingenious spring-loaded replacement, made of wood and iron. Toothless lands by the bed and approaches calmly, sniffing the new leg. He raises his eyes to meet Hiccup's, seemingly aware of what Hiccup is going through. Hiccup braces himself on the bedpost and tries to stand on it. He winces and stifles the pain...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay...okay... ... but STUMBLES with the first step. Toothless catches Hiccup's fall with his head... and slowly lifts him up, stabilizing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks bud. Hiccup leans on him like a crutch. They take a few steps together. Their missing parts form a poetic silhouette as they make their way toward the door. Hiccup pries it open (as he did in the opening scene), revealing a MONSTROUS NIGHTMARE flapping outside the door. Hiccup YELPS and slams the door closed. He turns to Toothless, alarmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless? Stay here, bud. Hiccup pauses... and cracks the door open again. He peeks outside, his eyes widening. He allows to door to swing open, revealing... ... the Monstrous Nightmare, carrying Snotlout on its back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on guys, get ready! Hold on tight! Here we go! A class of newbie dragon riders follow him through frame on a variety of dragons, pulling back the curtain on an amazing vista in which: "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 103. Vikings and dragons mill about by the dozen, basking on the rooftops, weaving along the plaza. No one seems upset, there isn't a sword in sight. Under the framework of a MASSIVE BARN, a Nadder BLASTS fire onto a metal brace. It steps back to let a Viking hammer it into shape. Nearby, a Gronkle lands, carrying a tree trunk in his mouth. He shows a Viking what he's found. The Viking pats his head. Another Viking backs a Zippleback into a stall to check it for size. Hiccup takes a step outside, finding Stoick waiting for him on the step.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew it. I'm dead. Stoick laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, but you gave it your best shot. He puts his arm around Hiccup, steadying him. He gestures to the transformed village.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So? What do you think? Hiccup just shrugs, amazed. Below, the plaza, villagers take notice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey look! It's Hiccup! They rush over, surrounding him with a hero's welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup, how you doin' mate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's great to see you up and about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turns out all we needed was a little more of... (GESTURES NON-SPECIFICALLY AT HICCUP) ... this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just gestured to all of me. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 104.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Well. Most of you. Gobber pushes through the crowd, beaming proudly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: the prosthetic leg) That bit's my handiwork. With a little Hiccup flare thrown in. Think it'll do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bittersweet, coming to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I might make a few tweaks. Astrid appears and jabs Hiccup in the arm. Hiccup recoils with a grumble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's for scaring me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What, is it always going to be this way? Cause I... She grabs him aggressively... then kisses him. Hoots and hollers follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... could get used to it. Gobber presents Hiccup with a rebuilt saddle, rigging, and tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome home. Suddenly, Toothless pounces on the crowd, crushing several unsuspecting Vikings under his weight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Night Fury, get down! Toothless eyes the new tail excitedly, tongue wagging. Amidst the groans and grumbles, Hiccup and Astrid exchange a sheepish grin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup's prosthetic foot, snapping into the modified stirrup. "Dragon" DeBlois/Sanders Final Draft (Rev.19) 02-13-2010 105. The two pieces click together, forming a single shape. Astride Toothless, he's whole again. He rotates the pedal. The new tail opens. Bright red with a skull and Viking horns emblazoned on it. Hiccup approves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Hiccup and Toothless, saddled up and ready to fly. Astrid backs her Nadder into position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ready? Toothless SNORTS an excited 'yes!' From his mount, Hiccup looks out over the changed world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) This... is Berk. (BEAT) It snows nine months of the year... and hails the other three. They LEAP into the bright blue sky, together as one. Astrid follows, giving chase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any food that grows here is tough and tasteless. The people that grow here are even more so. Hiccup and Astrid race their dragons through the village -- under eaves, over rooftops, down cliff-sides, and between ship masts. It's a high energy, romantic dance of sorts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) The only upsides are the pets. While other places have...ponies or parrots, we have... Their fellow recruits join them as they take to the open sky, rocketing far above the village. The Northern sky swirls with blazing, multicolored dragons. Hiccup and Toothless break from the pack, spinning into the blinding sun.
direction.name: direction
